text: Ara yara an'yayacarana karachila tadera jan'ya yadi prthibite ya ache se-sabata'i thakata ebam tara sange era samana ara'o, tara era dbara paritrana pete ca'ita kiyamatera dinera sastira bhisanata theke. Ara allahâ€Œra kacha theke emana tadera samane parisphuta habe ya tara kakhano hiseba kare dekhe ni.
